Class.name: Custom.QUESTIONNAIREQOP
Class.ViewQuery: SELECT ID AS ROWID, Q1 AS OperationDate, Q2 AS Surgeon, Q3 AS Assistant, Q4 AS Anaesthetist, Q5 AS Operation, Q6 AS OperativeDiagnosis, Q7 AS DetailsOfOperationincludingIncisonsFindingsAndProc, Q8 AS SpecimensToPathology, Q9 AS PostOpOrders, Q10 AS OperationTime, Q11 AS SurgicalOutcomeScore, Q12 AS WardTypePostOp, QHOSP AS Hospital, QUESDate AS DateUpdated, QUESTime AS TimeUpdated, QUESUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserUpdated, QUESCreateDate AS DateCreated, QUESCreateTime AS TimeCreated, QUESCreateUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserCreated, QUESScore AS Score, QUESStatusDR AS Status FROM questionnaire.QOP
